Package nuhker

Nuhkima - is the Estonian verb "to covertly obtain intelligence".

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DBze
    This interface is used as a pseudo Database interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CC
    This class contains the manually kept enum database of country codes that RIPE is serving.
    CLIGrammar
    This class is depending on the joptsimple library and is used to describe the grammar of CLI options that Run.java takes.
    DataDiver
    DataDiver is the class that does the actual recursion.
    DefaultParms
    This class keeps important runtime parameters that the business logic has to consider at any time.
    ForeignCode
    Foreign code is kept in this Class, i.e.
    Func
    Here are concentrated some simple functions (oops, methods) we need here and there.
    ParseGSB
    GSB - Google Safe Browsing - a reputation service to indicate whether aninternet site is clean or contaminated by the malware.
    ParseRIPE
    The ParseRIPE class is to raise an argument against RIPE public interface to return the constituency (extent of IP networks) of a country.
    Run
    No multi-threading at all.
    TypeWriter
    This class is NOT READY yet.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CC.cc  

Package nuhker Description

Nuhkima - is the Estonian verb "to covertly obtain intelligence". Nuhker - is the tool doing so. This package is meant to be an educational object to excercise within the Java language. Very obviously, the algorithms used as well as the knowledge domain were previously known. Launch it from CLI and it will gather some Open Source Intelligence about malware sites being noticed within your TLD (top-level-domain).
Author:
coder037@xyz.ee
